node.description: Filter a VCF file annotated with SNPEff or VEP with terms from Sequence-Ontology. Reasoning : Children of user's SO-terms will be also used.

setting.name: disableReasoning
setting.description: disable reasoning, don't use term's children.

node.documentation:
See also: https://github.com/lindenb/jvarkit/wiki/VcffilterSequenceOntology.
Example To list the variants having a "feature_elongation" : use SO:0001907 ( http://www.sequenceontology.org/browser/current_release/term/SO:0001907) .
